item.title: The DAO Disaster Illustrates Differing Philosophies in Bitcoin and Ethereum
item.description:
The DAO Disaster Illustrates Differing Philosophies in Bitcoin and Ethereum

July 04, 2016 - Posted by Kyle Torpey on Analysis In the fallout of the recent disaster known as The DAO, the Ethereum community is trying to figure out how to properly rectify the situation. Code that would allow miners to signal support for a hard fork for the purpose of refunding DAO token holders is expected to be available in most Ethereum clients soon.

item.title: EB138 - Sergio Lerner: How RSK Will Bring Smart Contracts To Bitcoin
item.description:
EB138 - Sergio Lerner: How RSK Will Bring Smart Contracts To Bitcoin

Security researcher and RSK co-founder Sergio Lerner joined us to discuss RSK (also Rootstock), the project to launch a turing-complete smart contract sidechain to Bitcoin. We talked about how he got into the industry, spending countless days analyzing Bitcoin for vulnerabilities and finding a few along the way.

item.title: Trading Corporate Secrets Becoming New Darknet Industry
item.description:
Trading Corporate Secrets Becoming New Darknet Industry

The seemingly unstoppable growth of "darknet" marketplaces is creating a new commodity industry - corporate insider information. Also read: Cryptsy CEO Recruits Hackers to Recover Lost Coins The mainstream media would have you believe the dark web is primarily for distributing drugs and child pornography - much as they did with the regular Internet back in the mid-1990s.

item.title: Abra Bitcoin Remittance App Enters US Market | PYMNTS.com
item.description:
Abra Bitcoin Remittance App Enters US Market | PYMNTS.com

Abra, the bitcoin remittance app, has made its way to the U.S. - via the iPhone and Android app options. What that means is that Abra customers in the U.S. or the Philippines can send money to each other using the app's digital wallet that works with their bank accounts.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/05/2016 - Stalling Halfway! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/05/2016 - Stalling Halfway! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be in for more volatility today as US traders return from their Fourth of July holiday. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be in for more volatility today as US traders return from their Fourth of July holiday.
